topic.title: Editing Documents
topic.shortdesc: The various editor types that are available in and their unique editing features

body.p: This chapter includes a large amount of information about editing numerous types of documents, how to create and work with documents, working with projects, and various editing features that are provided in . Each type of document has unique features and options when editing them in , while some editing features are available for all document types. This chapter also includes information about some of the special tools that are included in , such as the file and directory comparison tools.
